Hall of the London Scottish, Buckingham Gate, Westminster, City of Westminster, Greater London, England, UK 7th Annual Contest organised for British Legion Brass Bands.
There was also a parallel contest for BL military bands
Source - Musical Progress and Mail, June 1931.
